long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension solves a very frustrating problem by changing the My eBay link and once again making it point to the eBay Seller Hub Overview. Works on eBay.com and international eBay sites.

Changes:
7/31/20: Fixed bug causing error on pages which don't feature My eBay link.
8/15/20: Added support for most international eBay sites.
8/25/20: Added support for ebay.cn, ebay.com.hk, and ebay.com.tw.
3/18/21: Restored functionality after eBay made changes to site.
12/4/22: Updated to manifest v3.
